mapper.insert: insert into sys_file (name, url, extension, type, create_by, create_time) values (#{name}, #{url}, #{extension}, #{type}, #{createBy}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
select id,name,url,extension,type from sys_file
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') and type like concat('%', #{type}, '%') and extension like concat('%', #{extension}, '%')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
